item.description:
**** We are postponing this event due to lack of response/low attendance. I'll try again next month! *****

 

Thanks to a former member's suggestions, I found out that Loving Hut, a vegan chain restaurant, has a lunch buffet for $10 on the second Saturday of every month.  This chain has been voted best casual restaurant in the VegNews Veggie Awards.

Let's try this in October, and if it's a hit, maybe make it a monthly event. I believe they donate part of the proceeds to a vegan related organization, at least for some of the months.

Maybe we can combine this with a fun activity in Worcester. Any ideas??
item.how_to_find_us: Look at profile pics and ask at the front. We will have a reservation.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: **postponed**Lunch Buffet at Loving Hut in Worcester
